gobblin.metrics.hadoop

Class NewAPIHadoopCounterReporter<KI,VI,KO,VO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareScheduledReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.hadoop.AbstractHadoopCounterReporter
          • gobblin.metrics.hadoop.NewAPIHadoopCounterReporter<KI,VI,KO,VO>
  • Type Parameters:
    KI - the input key type of hadoopContext
    VI - the input value type of hadoopContext
    KO - the output key type of hadoopContext
    VO - the output value type of hadoopContext
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class NewAPIHadoopCounterReporter<KI,VI,KO,VO>
extends AbstractHadoopCounterReporter
    An implementation of ContextAwareScheduledReporter that reports applicable metrics as Hadoop counters using a TaskInputOutputContext.
